
{{alias}}( x, index, value )
    Return a new array after updating an index into the input array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ArrayLikeObject
        The input array to be updated.

    index: integer
        The index of the element to be replaced.

    value: any
        The value to replace the element at the specified index.

    Returns
    -------
    out: ArrayLikeObject
        The updated array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var x = [ 1, 2, 3, 4 ];
    > {{alias}}( x, 0, 5 )
    [ 5, 2, 3, 4 ]
    > {{alias}}( x, -1, 6 )
    [ 1, 2, 3, 6 ]

    See Also
    --------
